import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a category"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/categories/{CategoryId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Soft-deletes a category so it no longer appears in active lists while preserving history. Use this to remove a category from selection lists; you can restore it later with the undelete endpoint if needed.

**Prerequisites**
1. **CategoryId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/categories/v2](/docs/api/categories/search-categories-v-2) to find the category and extract `Items[].CategoryId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search categories to confirm the target CategoryId.
2. [DELETE /api/v1.0/categories/\{CategoryId\}](/docs/api/categories/delete-category) to deactivate it.

**Minimal Required Fields**: CategoryId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"CategoryId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the category to delete"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
